name: foodfourlife
0: ”Alexa, ask food four life what is for lunch today?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: food four life
des: food four life is a skill that allows users to interact with their Alexa device to hear menu items for a given period of time for cafeterias that employ the services of Taher Inc., a chef-driven professional food service. Users will be able to issue commands, such as "What is for lunch this week?" and "What is for breakfast today?", and in-turn hear food options that are available to them either at their school. In doing so, the user will be better equipped to make an informed decision in their daily sustenance.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
